name: The Twin Cycle
description:
Controls 
  • Move to Left and Right with Arrow Keys
  • Up Arrow Key to jump
  • Down Arrow key to interact with objects
  • Spacebar to change between characters
*also can be played with joysticks* Team
  • Alef Main Developer
  • Mika Main Designer
  • Jiojani Musics
  • Jinicius Game Level
  • Gui Haves a very suspicious timing for gets sick
